question: True about Color blindness:
exp: Ans. (a) Males are more proneRef: A.K. Khurana 6th ed. /329* Color blindness is an X-Linked recessive condition. Females are always carrier and males are always affected. Hence males are more affected than females.* Most common type of color blindness: Deutranopia

question: A patient has complaint of seeing coloured holoes in the evening and blurring of vision for last few days with normal IOP:
exp: Ans. is 'a' i.e. Prodromal phase of acute angle closure glaucoma
opa: Prodromal phase of acute angle closure glaucoma
